title: BRIEF-China Online Education Q4 Non-GAAP Net Loss Per Ads RMB 7.50
text: March 26, 2018 / 9:15 AM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-China Online Education Q4 Non-GAAP Net Loss Per Ads RMB 7.50 Reuters Staff March 26 (Reuters) - China Online Education Group: * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE RMB 245 MILLION TO RMB 250 MILLION * BASIC AND DILUTED NET LOSS PER ADS FOR Q4 2017 WAS RMB7.95 (US$1.20)‍​ * ‍Q1 2018 GROSS BILLINGS TO BE BETWEEN RMB340 MILLION TO RMB350 MILLION, WHICH WOULD REPRESENT AN INCREASE OF ABOUT 5% TO 8% * NON-GAAP BASIC AND DILUTED NET LOSS PER ADS FOR Q4 2017 WAS RMB7.50 (US$1.20)‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
